name: STICKMAN CODES
description: A collection of interactive games designed to teach coding concepts. Features a Fire Rescue game for loops, a Stickman Arrays game for collections, an IF-ELSE Runner for conditional logic, a Stickman Stack Tower for the LIFO principle, a Stickman Barista game for the FIFO (Queue) principle, a Tower of Hanoi game for recursion visualization, a Sorting Algorithms game teaching Bubble, Selection, and Insertion Sort, a bright Beach Bridge game where stickmen walk on top of wooden planks to learn singly linked lists, and a Treasure Hunt game for linear search algorithm.
